FLOOR.description: The item is to be placed like a block, on the ground or off the side face of a block

HANGING.description: The item is to be placed like an item frame or painting, against a wall

CEILING.description: The item is to be placed like glow berries, from a ceiling

WALL.description: Similar to hanging, except the item orientation (the invisible frame) is in the same orientation as FLOOR (on the bottom face of the block, facing up)

ANY.description: The item can be placed in any of the aforementioned placements options
